<center>
<h1 align="center">JSLinux Fullscreen</h4>
</center>

### About

This is a rather small script that completely redesigns [linux.new](https://linux.new) with a fresh coat of paint and a satisfying dark mode, along with some other beneficial features.

<center><a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/QuarTheDev/userscripts/main/jslinux-redesign.user.js"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/QuarTheDev/userscripts/main/.github/images/jslinux-redesign-preview.png" alt="ðŸ¤”" title="Preview"></a></center>
